text:
e="preserve">Michael John Tilleman (March 30, 1944 – September 18, 2020) was an American professional football player. He was a defensive tackle in the National Football League (NFL) for 11 seasons (1966–76). He played college football for the Montana Grizzlies. He was born in Chinook, Montana.
He played for the Minnesota Vikings, New Orleans Saints, Houston Oilers and the Atlanta Falcons.
Tilleman died on September 18, 2020 in Havre, Montana from heart disease-related problems, aged 76.
